answers.answer: Go to the ER if you have any of the following:* Cough with greenish or yellow mucus; bloody sputum happens on occasion* Fever with shaking chills* Sharp or stabbing chest pain worsened by deep breathing or coughing* Rapid, shallow breathing* Shortness of breathIf none of the above, you may have allergies. Go see a doctor for proper treatment.

question: I am worried about my health. I have a type 2 diabetes and I have observed that I sneeze frequently just recently...and I'm a bit worried because I think it could be a symptom of Pneumonia....What is your advice to me?
title: Do I have a Pneumonia?
